key.name: Good to see you, $MyPCName$! You caught my attention today because your outfit is quite spectacular! Say, $MyPCName$, do you know the myth of Olympus?
It's about the constellation Taurus, you see. Zeus was captivated by Europa and transformed into a bull to woo her.
That bull later become the constellation Taurus! Neat, right? Wondering why it's relevant to you? I'll tell you... once you've equipped the full Olympus set!
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Olympus outfit! Hehe!
Oh, my! You look like you've popped straight out of some myth! You'll look perfect riding around on this $item:50600194$!
Good to see you, $MyPCName$! You caught my attention today because your outfit is quite spectacular! Say, $MyPCName$, do you like cats?
Silly me, of course you do! Otherwise, you wouldn't be wearing what you're wearing, would you? You know, I love cats, too! But you take it to a whole other level... Cat and neon? By still my heart!
How awesome would you look in the entire Technokitty set, am I right? I really want to see that! Show me, and I'll even give you a present that will match beautifully!
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Technokitty outfit! Hehe!
Look at that fun! Look at that funky! You, my friend, are a funkster, and you definitely deserve this $item:20301955$! Way to go, $MyPCName$!
$MyPCName$! $MyPCName$! $MyPCName$! I can't look away! You are just a shining beacon of pure adventuring prowess and dignity, oh my!
I mean, you always look great, but I want you to look great, know what I mean? And some clothes are just so... dignified!
Don the entire Dignified Armor set, and I'll just drool over how amazing you look. I mean it! I won't be able to stop myself from showering you with an amazing gift that matches the set!
Oh darling, you still need an item or two or five to complete the Dignified Armor set! Hehe!
Oh, good gracious. This is a look that will remain etched in my memory forever. Please, take this $item:40400090$ as a small token of my gratitude. You've made my week, $MyPCName$!
Well, isn't that a special outfit? It seems you want to be cute like a kitten.
I've got the perfect Kitten Maid outfit for you, $MyPCName$. I can't wait to see the cuteness ooze from your every pore when you put it on!
If you equip the entire Kitten Maid set and show it to me, I will give you a $item:20302118$ in return.
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Kitten Maid set! Hehe!
Cuteness upon cuteness! I wasn't prepared for how adorable you look. Take your kitty cuteness to the next level with this $item:20302118$.
Is there an image that comes to mind when you hear the word angel? Did you think of a beautiful angel with pure white wings? In that case, I want to tell you all about fallen angels.
Some people think of devils when the hear about fallen angels. There are many stories of devils that were banished and became fallen angels. Even so, fallen angels are pretty popular!

Maybe that's why they appeared before us in such a beautiful form! Just like the clothes you're wearing right now, $MyPCName$! I'll give you a special badge as a gift if you equip the entire Fallen Angel set!
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Fallen Angel set! Hehe!
Wow! It's grim, but noble! I've seen you many times, but this is the most beautiful you've ever looked!
The cold winter is already upon us. But winter's got its good points, too! For example, I get to see the brightly shining clothes that you're wearing!
I imagine a snow spirit making snow fall on everyone to give them joy. Doesn't that sound like a fairytale?

But what you're wearing is making me imagine such things! I wonder how beautiful it would be if you equip the entire set? I look forward to it! If you look like a snow spirit from a fairytale, I'll give you a weapon skin to match the look!
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Snow Tale set! Hehe!
Wow! You really look like you will make the snow fall! It's very beautiful!
$MyPCName$, do you like shiny things? I ask because your new outfit positively shimmers!
I'm so jealous of your shiny clothes.
I love shiny things too. I can't imagine how beautifully you'll shine wearing the entire set! I'd love to see it. In fact, if you come back wearing the full set, I'll give you a special gift!
I think you're still missing a few items from the Luminaire outfit! Hehe!
Wow! You are shining brightly! It's dazzingly beautiful!
Sometimes looking up at the night sky makes me think of distant, otherworldly places. Looking at you, $MyPCName$, makes me think of those people living in the heavens!
Everyone heard stories of such people at least once in their lifetime! Light and fluttering! They are very graceful!
$MyPCName$, even you look like you will fly up to the sky soon! Look like one of those heavenly people and I will give you a nice fan that you can fly on!
You still need an item or two or five to complete the Heavenly Being set! Hehe!
Show me how great you look as you fly to the sky!
SCRIPTQUEST_0304143915000070_NAME
SCRIPTQUEST_0304143915000071_NAME
SCRIPTQUEST_0304143915000072_NAME
SCRIPTQUEST_0304143915000073_NAME
SCRIPTQUEST_0304143915000074_NAME
Hi, $MyPCName$! I rushed over here to tell you about some special quests hidden inside outfits you might encounter soon!
You'll know you've encountered one when you see a quest mark displayed on the outfit's icon! Equip the item, and you'll be given a special quest!
Hover your mouse over items with hidden quests to view a detailed description. Equip the item, and I'll visit you with a special quest!
Was my explanation good enough?
It's a secret which outfits have hidden quests, hehe! Here's a little gift, $MyPCName$, to wish you good luck in getting a surprise quest soon!
Hi, $MyPCName$! I want to tell you about some special quests hidden inside outfits you might encounter soon!
You'll know you've encountered one when you see a quest mark displayed on the outfit's icon! Equip the item, and you'll be given a special quest!
Hover your mouse over items with hidden quests to view a detailed description. Equip the item, and my friend $npc:11001612[gender:1]$ will visit you with a special quest!
Now, how do you know which items have hidden quests? Well, you can take a peek in my shop and see which ones they are. That means you'll need to come visit me often, hehe.
I hope you get to experience some hidden quests, $MyPCName$! They're so exciting!
